description:
ADD TO YOUR WISHLIST NOW! CHECK INMORTUAE METUUNT: RISE OF THE UNDEAD ON STEAM.

In Inmortuae Metuunt: Rise of The Undead, the Player will face waves of demons that get stronger with each new round!

To face the undead army and discover the truth about the demon outbreaks, the player will earn "Soul Points" that can be used to get new weapons, skills and improvements.

• KILL DEMONS

Kill demons to earn soul points! "In Inmortuae Metuunt, you can buy everything with soul points... everything..." - Baltazar

• BUY GUNS

Need better weapons to kill demons? Find the "Altar of War" closest to you! In it you can spend your hard-earned souls on a bet that MAYBE will give you a better weapon! But don't be sad if you get a turd gun that doesn't kill anything... you can always spend more souls!

• EXPLORE

You can also open doors that will give you access to new areas of the map, to discover all its secrets... and all you have to do is give me more souls.

• UPGRADE WEAPONS

With each new round, the demons get stronger, so you can't be left behind either! Use "Hell Rift" to improve your weapons' damage and ammo capacity.

CHARACTERS

Inmortuae Metuunt: Rise of the Undead offers the option to select 4 different characters, each one with its history, abilities, advantages and disadvantages.

• JACK MILLER

Jack Miller is a German-Brazilian who ended up getting involved in the Palmares Outbreak. Despite being just an ordinary person looking for his family, Jack has great physical strength and is very skilled with firearms, which made him able to face the waves of demons that dared to cross his path.

• BINH PONG

The Vietnamese, Binh Pong, became a demon hunter after his village was destroyed in an attack by the hordes of hell. In this sad situation he met Virgolini... since then they work together. Despite his age and appearance, Pong is a quick and flexible man, managing to escape death even in the most complicated situations.

• GIUSEPPE VIRGOLINI

The Italian, Giuseppe Virgolini, is a master of weapons, he can quickly learn their mechanics and functions, making the best out of his weapons quickly and efficiently. As he is a professional Demon Hunter for the Church, they have access to special items and artifacts that protect them from demonic forces.

• PHILIP THOMPSON

Philip Thompson is a Scottish Army veteran. With above-average aim, he always knows the weaknesses of his enemies, in addition, Thompson is an experienced and charismatic leader, the type that always keeps his team strong and united, always trying to protect his men on the battlefield. Sometimes he does some services for the Catholic Church, especially when it comes to demon outbreaks.
